name: Blu the Airmail Delivery Bird (Nokia Jam Version)
name_original: Blu the Airmail Delivery Bird (Nokia Jam Version)
description:
Remember Blu? This little blue bird is back in action in this Nokia adaptation of Blu the Airmail Delivery Bird.

Your goal is to deliver mail, while dodging enemies and walls, and to score as high as you can before you run out of lives.

Sorry this game isn't as polished as I'd like, but there's an ice storm warning for our state and I wanted to get something out before we potentially lost power.

Press and hold Z to shoot mail. Press X to fire shots. Press UP/DOWN to move. Press SPACE to pause. Alternatively you can use the numpad (see in-game for mapping.) Finally, you can press F1 to enable an LCD ghosting simulation, if that's your thing.
